fields.name: DrivingLicenceYesNo
fields.fieldText: Do you have a Driving Licence?

fields.name: Driving_Licence_Number
fields.fieldText: Driving Licence Number
fields.helpText:
Your driving licence number can be found in section 5 of your driving licence photocard


﻿

fields.name: Driving_Licence_Expiry_Date
fields.fieldText: Driving Licence Expiry Date
fields.helpText: Your driving licence expiry date can be found in section 4b of your driving licence photocard

fields.name: BusinessDriverText
fields.fieldText:
Business Driving


A Business Driver is anyone driving for work purposes, other than to their normal place of work. Driving to customers/ suppliers/ trade shows / other colleagues' home offices could be classed as 'Business Driving'.


For the avoidance of doubt, we advise all drivers to obtain Business Driving Insurance and Majenta will reimburse all reasonable additional costs for this.

fields.name: IsBusinessDriver
fields.fieldText: Tick if you use your own vehicle for Majenta Business other than to commute to one place of work.

fields.name: InsuranceText
fields.fieldText: Please confirm your Insurance Renewal Date and upload proof of Car Insurance with Business Cover as well as current MOT and Road Tax.

fields.name: Insurance_Renewal_Date
fields.fieldText: Insurance Renewal Date

value.stringValue: Upload Supporting Documentation (Car Insurance, MOT, Road Tax))

fields.name: IsConfirmDocsUploaded
fields.fieldText: Tick to confirm you have uploaded all relevant documents above.

fields.name: EAPText
fields.fieldText: Confidential Employee Assistance Programme

fields.name: EAPText2
fields.fieldText:
Sometimes it can be difficult to balance the pressures of work with the needs of home life. Majenta recognises help is sometimes needed to deal with the challenges you may face in life.


www.healthassuredeap.com

0800 047 4097

fields.name: EAPConfirm
fields.fieldText: I confirm that I have read and understood the above

fields.name: EmployeeRecordText
fields.fieldText: Salesforce – Employee Record

fields.name: EmployeeRecordText2
fields.fieldText:
§To make sure everyone's details are up-to-date and accurate, you will be responsible for your own record making sure the current details are correct as well as updating them as and when, e.g., if you move address.

§If you do update anything on your record, Alison Hill will be alerted automatically via salesforce.

§Alison Hill will be contacting you via email to confirm your details are correct on Salesforce:-

  • Equipment 
  • Address 
  • Passport 
  • National Insurance
  • Driving for Business – Car Insurance

fields.name: EmployeeRecordConfirm
fields.fieldText: I confirm that I have read and understood the above

fields.name: ExpensesText
fields.fieldText: Expenses

fields.name: ExpensesText2
fields.fieldText:
§We will reimburse expenses properly incurred.

§Expenses will only be reimbursed if they are :-

     Agreed in advance.

     Claimed using the emailed expenses form.

     Supported by relevant documents.

§Expenses must be submitted by the 5th of each month and are paid in arrears with your salary.

§Please email queries and completed expenses to:- expenses@majentasolutions.com.

§You will receive a welcome email from the department with a Blank Expense Schedule.

fields.name: ExpensesConfirm
fields.fieldText: I confirm that I have read and understood the above

fields.name: HolidayText
fields.fieldText: Booking a Holiday

fields.name: Debug
fields.fieldText:
Holiday Booking Confirmed: {!GET_EmployeeRecord.IsConfirmedHolidayBooking__c}


ID: {!GET_EmployeeRecord.Id}

fields.name: HolidayTextLeft
fields.fieldText:
Please raise a holiday request through Salesforce on your employee record

 Your manager will be notified and will action your request. You will then receive a confirmation email to show whether it has been approved or rejected.

Please see the video below for a tutorial.

fields.name: HolidayTextRight
fields.fieldText:
General Holiday Guidelines

25 days per annum plus Bank holidays.

Minimum of 4 weeks notice for a holiday of 1 week or more.

Holiday year runs 1st Jan until 31st Dec.

fields.name: HolidayConfirm
fields.fieldText: I confirm that I have read and understood the above

fields.name: HoursOfWorkText
fields.fieldText: Hours of Work.﻿

fields.name: HoursOfWorkText2
fields.fieldText:
§The Employees normal working hours shall be 37.5 hours per week, Monday to Friday (excluding lunch breaks).

§Start and finish times to be agreed with your Direct Line Manager

fields.name: HoursOfWorkConfirm
fields.fieldText: I confirm that I have read and understood the above

fields.name: Copy_1_of_IntroText
fields.fieldText:
Introduction

What to expect when you start.

﻿Please check these off as they are completed

fields.name: ITText
fields.fieldText: IT Solutions – Reporting an Issue

fields.name: ITText2
fields.fieldText:
Solutions 4 IT support us for any IT related issues such as :

  • Office 365
  • Hardware
  • Connectivity
  • General IT Issues

Telephone : 01384 413434

Email: help@solutions4it.co.uk

fields.name: ITConfirm
fields.fieldText: I confirm that I have read and understood the above.

fields.name: MobilePhoneIssued
fields.fieldText: Do you currently have a Majenta-Issued Mobile Phone?

fields.name: MobileFormTItle
fields.fieldText: Majenta Solutions Care and Repair

fields.name: ReceiptConfirmText
fields.fieldText: I confirm receipt of the following phone and model:

fields.name: ModelName
fields.fieldText: Model Name
fields.helpText: Can be found by going to Settings>Phone>My Number

fields.name: SerialNumber
fields.fieldText: Serial Number
fields.helpText: Can be found by going to Settings>General>About>Serial Number

fields.name: SIMNumber
fields.fieldText: SIM Number
fields.helpText: Can be found by going to Settings>General>About>ICCID

validationRule.errorMessage: The SIM Number must be 19 digits only, with no spaces

fields.name: IMEINumber
fields.fieldText: IMEI Number
fields.helpText: Can be found by going to Settings>General>About>IMEI

validationRule.errorMessage: The IMEI Number must be 15 digits only, with no spaces

fields.name: DisplayPhoneChangeText
fields.fieldText: If this changes in future, you can add the details by going to the Equipment tab at the bottom of your Employee Record and clicking New to create a new Business Phone record.

fields.name: SubtitleDisplayText
fields.fieldText: Responsibility for appropriate care and protection

fields.name: DamageConfirm
fields.fieldText: I confirm that I understand that any damage caused which is outside the device’s warranty that requires repair will be my responsibility. I undertake to look after the phone and guard properly and adequately it against any breakage, loss or theft.

fields.name: CostWarning
fields.fieldText: Please Note – Phone numbers staring 0845 have a high charge per minute. Please try to find an alternative local number where possible. If you have any questions, please speak to Donna Callan (Accounts) or Melissa Thorpe (Office Manager).

fields.name: PensionText
fields.fieldText: Pension

fields.name: PensionText2
fields.fieldText:
§You will receive an email to register on the Smart Pension portal when you first enrol.

§Smart Pension

§Majenta contributions are 3%

§You are required to pay a minimum of 3%

§You can increase your contribution but Majenta’s contribution will stay at 3%.

§You have the option to opt out once first payment has gone through and this amount will be reimbursed.

fields.name: PensionConfirm
fields.fieldText: I confirm that I have read and understood the above

fields.name: PersonalDetailsText
fields.fieldText: Personal Details

fields.name: PersonalDetailsText2
fields.fieldText: Please complete the details below, amending where appropriate.

fields.name: PersonalDetailsUploadText
fields.fieldText: Please upload any supporting documentation, such as Passport Scans etc.

fields.name: IsConfirmPersonalDetails
fields.fieldText: Please confirm that you have completed editing your Personal Details.

fields.name: SalaryText
fields.fieldText: Salary

fields.name: SalaryText2
fields.fieldText:
§Your salary will be payable monthly in arrears on or about the 28th day of each month.

§You will be paid directly into your bank or building society.

§You will receive an invite from MHA to your personal email address to register on the portal. From there you will be able to access all your payslips and pay documents

§First time accessing this you will set up an individual online portal.

§You will then be able to use this online portal to have access to previous payslips and tax information also.

fields.name: SalaryConfirm
fields.fieldText: I confirm that I have read and understood the above

fields.name: SicknessHeader
fields.fieldText: Sickness Reporting

fields.name: SicknessTextLeft
fields.fieldText: If you cannot attend work because you are ill or injured please telephone your Line Manager.

fields.name: SicknessTextMid
fields.fieldText:
When convenient, please also log the absence on your employee record in Salesforce with the following details:

Nature of illness.

Expected length of absence from work.

Contact details

Any outstanding or urgent work

Please see the below video for a tutorial

fields.name: SicknessConfirm
fields.fieldText: I confirm that I have read and understood the above

fields.name: SicknessTextRight
fields.fieldText:
Your manager will be notified through salesforce.

You should expect to be contacted during your absence by your department or line manager to enquire about your health.

fields.name: StaffHandbookText
fields.fieldText: Staff Handbook

fields.name: StaffHandbookText2
fields.fieldText:
§Your contract and handbook work alongside each other.

§Please refer to these if you wish to check anything.

§You will be able to access the company handbook through salesforce on your employee record located in the ‘Documents’ tab

§If you need a further copy, please ask.

§If you have any questions in regard to the handbook or contract, please contact:-

    Hr@majentasolutions.com

fields.name: StaffHandbookConfirm
fields.fieldText: I confirm that I have read and understood the above

Welcome to Majenta, {!$User.FirstName} {!$User.LastName}
